text: hello and welcome back to cubec con

for our second set of Keynotes it is
incredible to think about the remarkable
Journey that kubernetes has taken us
on from its Inception to now the growth
and the impact of this technology has
been nothing short of
spectacular and Cube con Cloud native
con is not just about the technology
it's about the vibrant passionate and
collaborative community that has built
around this technology and together we
have created a movement that is
transforming the way we develop deploy
and manage applications and our hope is
cubec Con Cloud native con will Empower
all of us to be architects of our future

conference on the topic of community
like last cubec con let's continue to
recognize our community members and

and small in the celebrate cncf slack
Channel with that said I would like to
introduce our first keynote speakers of
the day hymon Mala is a senior software
engineer at data dog and luron ber is a
principal engineer at data
dog earlier this this year in March data
dog experienced a significant Global
outage that lasted nearly 48 hours
during which they lost 60% of their
kubernetes nodes in less than an hour
today hymon and lauron will discuss what
triggered this outage the challenges
they faced recovering from it and
valuable lessons learned from this
experience please welcome to the stage
hymon and luron
